descriptionlist.description: Get rid of the ugly notification badges. NOTE: DO NOT INSTALL IF YOU DON'T KNOW HOW TO GET OUT OF SAFEMODE, IF YOU GET INTO SAFEMODE PLEASE DELETE THE SETTINGSFILE WITH FILZA /VAR/MOBILE/LIBRARY/PREFERENCES/COM.JANNIKCRACK.BADGEBARPREFS.PLIST AND RESPRING MAYBE THIS IS CAUSING THE SAFEMODE FOR SOME OF YOU, PLEASE TRY AND TELL ME IF IT WORKED OR NOT WORKED
